# BIRD-INTERACT 1.0

Content: ## üì∞ News - [2025-08-26] üöÄ We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set! It's a tough one ‚Äî the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions. üëâ For more details, please visit our [project website](https://bird-interact.github.io/). - [2025-08-26] üì¨ We'll be sending the **Ground Truth & Test cases** to our mailing list this week. If you want early access, please send an email as instructed on the site for an **automatic download**. - [2025-08-26] üíæ On another note, we've also released a SQLite version of **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** for easier local research. The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon! - [2025-08-22] **Bug Fix**: In Bird-Interact-Agent code, we fixed a bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc. ## üß∏ Overview BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**. The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations. It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases. Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **‚âà24%** and **‚âà18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.
Translation: ## üì∞ Novidades - [2025-08-26] üöÄ Estamos animados para anunciar o lan√ßamento do conjunto **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)**! Este √© desafiador ‚Äî os melhores LLMs est√£o alcan√ßando apenas **16,33%** de taxa de sucesso, com apenas **10,0%** nas se√ß√µes `c-interact` e `a-interact`. üëâ Para mais detalhes, visite nosso [site do projeto](https://bird-interact.github.io/). - [2025-08-26] üì¨ Vamos enviar os **Casos de Teste & Ground Truth** para nossa lista de e-mails esta semana. Se quiser acesso antecipado, envie um e-mail conforme instru√ß√µes no site para um **download autom√°tico**. - [2025-08-26] üíæ Al√©m disso, tamb√©m lan√ßamos uma vers√£o SQLite do **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** para facilitar pesquisas locais. As vers√µes completas **LiveSQLBench-Base** e **-Large** estar√£o dispon√≠veis em breve! - [2025-08-22] **Corre√ß√£o de Bug**: No c√≥digo Bird-Interact-Agent, corrigimos um bug onde, ao avaliar o SQL da fase-2, o SQL armazenado da fase-1 n√£o podia ser executado com sucesso, levando a uma taxa de sucesso menor na Fase-2. Esse bug afeta apenas tarefas onde o sql da fase1 realiza opera√ß√µes no banco de dados, por exemplo, CREATE table, etc. ## üß∏ Vis√£o Geral BIRD-INTERACT, um benchmark interativo de text-to-SQL, **reimagina a avalia√ß√£o Text-to-SQL sob a √≥tica das intera√ß√µes din√¢micas**. O ambiente mescla uma base de conhecimento hier√°rquica, documenta√ß√£o de banco de dados e um simulador de usu√°rio orientado por fun√ß√µes para recriar ambientes empresariais aut√™nticos em opera√ß√µes completas de **CRUD**. Oferece dois modos rigorosos de teste: (1) **Intera√ß√£o Conversacional** passiva e (2) **Intera√ß√£o Agente** ativa, abrangendo 600 tarefas anotadas incluindo Intelig√™ncia de Neg√≥cios (BI), opera√ß√µes CRUD e outros, cada uma protegida por casos de teste execut√°veis. As avalia√ß√µes t√≠picas envolvem de 1.968 a 5.496 rodadas de intera√ß√£o entre o modelo e o simulador de usu√°rio, enquanto modelos de racioc√≠nio de √∫ltima gera√ß√£o atualmente resolvem apenas **‚âà24%** e **‚âà18%** das tarefas, destacando o desafio do benchmark.

Content: ### ‚úÖ Two Evaluation Modes BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`. - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`. ### üê£ Lite Version We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation. ### ü¶ú Full Version The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon. ### Model Performance Results on BIRD-INTERACT Lite #### 1. **c-Interact** Performance | Rank | Model Name | Normalized Reward | Level | |:------:|--------------------|:-------:|:--------------:| | 1 | o3-mini | 33.04 | üèÜ Excellent Chat | | 2 | GPT-4o | 30.33 | üíé Good Chat | | 3 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 27.41 | üíé Good Chat | | 4 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 26.60 | ‚ú® Standard | | 5 | DeepSeek-R1 | 21.74 | ‚ú® Standard | | 6 | Qwen3 | 20.33 | ‚ö™ Basic | | 7 | DeepSeek-V3 | 15.85 | ‚ö™ Basic | #### 2. **a-Interact** Performance | Rank | Model Name | Budget Parameters* | Avg Steps/Task | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Normalized Reward | Level | |:------:|--------------------|:-------------------:|:----------------:|:---------------------:|:-------------------:|:---------------------:| | 1 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 6/6 | 15.4 | $0.6668 | 29.19 | üèÜ Excellent Interaction | | 2 | o3-mini | 6/6 | 7.8 | $0.0754 | 21.07 | üíé Good Interaction | | 3 | DeepSeek-V3 | 6/6 | 15.6 | $0.0629 | 19.19 | üíé Good Interaction | | 4 | Qwen3 | 6/6 | 12.5 | $0.0278 | 18.74 | ‚ú® Standard |
Translation: ### ‚úÖ Dois Modos de Avalia√ß√£o O BIRD-INTERACT suporta dois modos de avalia√ß√£o conforme mencionado acima: - **c-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Conversacional, que √© um modo passivo e o fluxo de trabalho √© fixo. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_conv`. - **a-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Agente, que √© um modo ativo incorporado onde o fluxo de trabalho √© din√¢mico e conduzido por modelos. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_agent`. ### üê£ Vers√£o Lite Estamos lan√ßando uma vers√£o lite do BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, que inclui 270 tarefas reais de alta qualidade especificamente para PostgreSQL. Este √© um bom ponto de partida para experimenta√ß√£o r√°pida. ### ü¶ú Vers√£o Completa A vers√£o completa do BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, √© um benchmark abrangente que inclui 600 tarefas para PostgreSQL. Ela cobre uma ampla gama de opera√ß√µes SQL e consultas de usu√°rios. A vers√£o completa estar√° dispon√≠vel em breve. ### Resultados de Desempenho dos Modelos no BIRD-INTERACT Lite #### 1. **Desempenho c-Interact** | Classifica√ß√£o | Nome do Modelo | Recompensa Normalizada | N√≠vel | |:------:|--------------------|:-------:|:--------------:| | 1 | o3-mini | 33.04 | üèÜ Chat Excelente | | 2 | GPT-4o | 30.33 | üíé Bom Chat | | 3 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 27.41 | üíé Bom Chat | | 4 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 26.60 | ‚ú® Padr√£o | | 5 | DeepSeek-R1 | 21.74 | ‚ú® Padr√£o | | 6 | Qwen3 | 20.33 | ‚ö™ B√°sico | | 7 | DeepSeek-V3 | 15.85 | ‚ö™ B√°sico | #### 2. **Desempenho a-Interact** | Classifica√ß√£o | Nome do Modelo | Par√¢metros de Or√ßamento* | M√©dia de Passos/Tarefa | M√©dia de Custo (USD)/Tarefa | Recompensa Normalizada | N√≠vel | |:------:|--------------------|:-------------------:|:----------------:|:---------------------:|:-------------------:|:---------------------:| | 1 | Claude-3.7-sonnet | 6/6 | 15.4 | $0.6668 | 29.19 | üèÜ Intera√ß√£o Excelente | | 2 | o3-mini | 6/6 | 7.8 | $0.0754 | 21.07 | üíé Boa Intera√ß√£o | | 3 | DeepSeek-V3 | 6/6 | 15.6 | $0.0629 | 19.19 | üíé Boa Intera√ß√£o | | 4 | Qwen3 | 6/6 | 12.5 | $0.0278 | 18.74 | ‚ú® Padr√£o |

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **c-Interact**: Intera√ß√£o Conversacional, que √© um modo passivo e o fluxo de trabalho √© fixo. O c√≥digo e informa√ß√µes detalhadas podem ser encontrados em `bird_interact_conv`.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.

Content:
| 5 | GPT-4o | 6/6 | 15.3 | $0.4594 | 18.37 | ‚ú® Standard | | 6 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 6/6 | 13.2 | $0.0337 | 17.26 | ‚ö™ Basic | | 7 | DeepSeek-R1 | 6/6 | 12.0 | $0.0931 | 17.07 | ‚ö™ Basic | > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details. ### Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.

## üì¶ Dataset Details ### Dataset Description - **Database:** The complete PostgreSQL database can be download from [the Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KABce6czIqL9kMyIX7i-_A0CIQoDnmyW/view). Check the [Quick Eval](#quick-eval) section for more details. - **data:** Each data instance contain the following main parts: - `selected_database`: The name of the database. - `query`: The unambiguous user query. - `amb_user_query`: The user query with injected ambiguities. - `user_query_ambiguity`: The ambiguities injected into the user query. - `non_critical_ambiguity`: The non-critical ambiguities like order, limit, etc. - `knowledge_ambiguity`: The ambiguities created by masked external knowledges. - `sol_sql`: The ground truth SQL solution. - `preprocess_sql`: SQL queries to run before executing the solution or prediction. - `clean_up_sql`: SQL queries to run after the test cases to revert any changes made to the database. - `test_cases`: A set of test cases to validate the predicted corrected SQL. - `follow_up`: The labeled follow up questions. - `external_knowledge`: The external knowledge related to the specific task. - **evaluation:** The evaluation code is available in the [`./evaluation`](./evaluation) directory. - **Curated by:** BIRD Team & Google Cloud - **License:** [cc-by-sa-4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) - **HuggingFace Dataset Card:** [bird-interact-lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-lite) ### Dataset Uses
Translation:
| 5 | GPT-4o | 6/6 | 15.3 | $0.4594 | 18.37 | ‚ú® Padr√£o | | 6 | Gemini-2.0-flash | 6/6 | 13.2 | $0.0337 | 17.26 | ‚ö™ B√°sico | | 7 | DeepSeek-R1 | 6/6 | 12.0 | $0.0931 | 17.07 | ‚ö™ B√°sico | > \* Par√¢metros de Or√ßamento: Or√ßamento Inicial/Or√ßamento de Paci√™ncia do Usu√°rio, medido por nossa moeda virtual *bird-coin*s . Consulte [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) para mais detalhes. ### Escalabilidade do Tempo de Intera√ß√£o (ITS) Escalabilidade do Tempo de Intera√ß√£o (ITS) refere-se √† capacidade de um modelo de aumentar continuamente seu desempenho final por meio de intera√ß√µes de m√∫ltiplos turnos. Quando esse desempenho interativo supera o desempenho idealizado do modelo em um turno √∫nico para uma tarefa totalmente especificada e inequ√≠voca, dizemos que ele satisfaz a **lei ITS**. √Ä medida que a paci√™ncia do usu√°rio aumenta e os turnos de intera√ß√£o se acumulam, o desempenho continua melhorando, demonstrando que o modelo pode sustentar uma comunica√ß√£o eficaz ao longo de di√°logos extensos. Atualmente, apenas encontramos que o claude-3-7-sonnet satisfaz a lei ITS.

## üì¶ Detalhes do Conjunto de Dados ### Descri√ß√£o do Conjunto de Dados - **Banco de Dados:** O banco de dados completo do PostgreSQL pode ser baixado pelo [Google Drive](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KABce6czIqL9kMyIX7i-_A0CIQoDnmyW/view). Veja a se√ß√£o [Quick Eval](#quick-eval) para mais detalhes. - **data:** Cada inst√¢ncia de dados cont√©m as seguintes partes principais: - `selected_database`: O nome do banco de dados. - `query`: A consulta do usu√°rio sem ambiguidades. - `amb_user_query`: A consulta do usu√°rio com ambiguidades inseridas. - `user_query_ambiguity`: As ambiguidades inseridas na consulta do usu√°rio. - `non_critical_ambiguity`: As ambiguidades n√£o cr√≠ticas como ordem, limite, etc. - `knowledge_ambiguity`: As ambiguidades criadas por conhecimentos externos mascarados. - `sol_sql`: A solu√ß√£o SQL de refer√™ncia. - `preprocess_sql`: Consultas SQL para rodar antes de executar a solu√ß√£o ou predi√ß√£o. - `clean_up_sql`: Consultas SQL para rodar ap√≥s os casos de teste, revertendo qualquer altera√ß√£o feita no banco de dados. - `test_cases`: Um conjunto de casos de teste para validar o SQL corrigido previsto. - `follow_up`: As perguntas de acompanhamento rotuladas. - `external_knowledge`: O conhecimento externo relacionado √† tarefa espec√≠fica. - **evaluation:** O c√≥digo de avalia√ß√£o est√° dispon√≠vel no diret√≥rio [`./evaluation`](./evaluation). - **Curadoria:** Equipe BIRD & Google Cloud - **Licen√ßa:** [cc-by-sa-4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) - **Cart√£o do Conjunto de Dados na HuggingFace:** [bird-interact-lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-lite) ### Usos do Conjunto de Dados

RowTranslations.originContent: > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: > \* Par√¢metros de Or√ßamento: Or√ßamento Inicial/Or√ßamento de Paci√™ncia do Usu√°rio, medido por nossa moeda virtual *bird-coin*s . Consulte [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) para mais detalhes.

RowTranslations.originContent: Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Escalabilidade do Tempo de Intera√ß√£o (ITS) refere-se √† capacidade de um modelo de aumentar continuamente seu desempenho final por meio de intera√ß√µes de m√∫ltiplos turnos. Quando esse desempenho interativo supera o desempenho idealizado do modelo em um turno √∫nico para uma tarefa totalmente especificada e inequ√≠voca, dizemos que ele satisfaz a **lei ITS**. √Ä medida que a paci√™ncia do usu√°rio aumenta e os turnos de intera√ß√£o se acumulam, o desempenho continua melhorando, demonstrando que o modelo pode sustentar uma comunica√ß√£o eficaz ao longo de di√°logos extensos. Atualmente, apenas encontramos que o claude-3-7-sonnet satisfaz a lei ITS.

- `selected_database`: O nome do banco de dados.
- `query`: A consulta do usu√°rio sem ambiguidades.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `amb_user_query`: The user query with injected ambiguities.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `user_query_ambiguity`: The ambiguities injected into the user query.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `non_critical_ambiguity`: The non-critical ambiguities like order, limit, etc.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `knowledge_ambiguity`: The ambiguities created by masked external knowledges.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `preprocess_sql`: SQL queries to run before executing the solution or prediction.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - `preprocess_sql`: Consultas SQL para rodar antes de executar a solu√ß√£o ou predi√ß√£o.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `clean_up_sql`: SQL queries to run after the test cases to revert any changes made to the database.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `test_cases`: A set of test cases to validate the predicted corrected SQL.

RowTranslations.originContent: - `external_knowledge`: The external knowledge related to the specific task.

Content:
To avoid data leakage by auto-crawling, we do not include GT solution sqls and test cases along with data.
please email [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) with the tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` in title for full set, which will be sent automatically.

RowTranslations.originContent: You can download the dataset from HuggingFace using the following command:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Voc√™ pode baixar o dataset do HuggingFace usando o seguinte comando:

Content:
```bash
from datasets import load_dataset
# Load the flash version of the dataset
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-lite")
print(dataset["lite"][0])

# Load the full version of the dataset (coming soon)
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-full")
print(dataset["full"][0])
```
Translation:
```bash
from datasets import load_dataset
# Load the flash version of the dataset
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-lite")
print(dataset["lite"][0])

# Load the full version of the dataset (coming soon)
dataset = load_dataset("birdsql/bird-interact-full")
print(dataset["full"][0])
```

Content: Or you can use the provided script to download the full version of the dataset and split it into different dialects.
Translation: Ou voc√™ pode usar o script fornecido para baixar a vers√£o completa do conjunto de dados e dividi-lo em diferentes dialetos.

Content:
```bash
cd baseline/data
python pull_data.py \
  --schema_path path/to/full_schema.jsonl \
  --input_path path/to/input.jsonl \ # Path to the input JSONL file (may be empty if you want to download the dataset from HuggingFace)
  --output_folder path/to/output_dir # output folder of the split files
``` -->
Translation:
```bash
cd baseline/data
python pull_data.py \
  --schema_path caminho/para/full_schema.jsonl \
  --input_path caminho/para/input.jsonl \ # Caminho para o arquivo JSONL de entrada (pode estar vazio se quiser baixar o conjunto de dados do HuggingFace)
  --output_folder caminho/para/output_dir # pasta de sa√≠da dos arquivos divididos
```
